text: Suçatı is a village in Mut district of Mersin Province, Turkey. It is situated to the west of the Göksu River at on the highway D-740 which connects Mut to Ermenek. Its distance to Mut is and to Mersin is . Population of Suçatı was 563 as of 2012. Olive production and cattle breeding are the main economic activities of the village.Türkçebilgi page ==References== Category:Villages in Mut District
title: Suçatı, Mut
